text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I did it! I've lived up to my reputation
as an honor student! Big・Baku・shin!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, there's no need to be shy!
Come, now! Compliment me to your heart's
content!
choice_data_list: Now that was an exemplary run!
Not quite yet! We've still got more to win!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Running an exemplary run is the very 
essence of being class president!
choice_data_list: I'm counting on you next time, too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! Leave it to the legendary
honor student, Sakura Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Let's aim straight for the next victory,
now! Bakushiiiiiii―n!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Huwhaa!? 
I, I won, and yet…!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You're so sure about our next victory!?
choice_data_list: I meant you shouldn't get so cocky……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Uuuuuf! If I don't live up to these
expectations, I'll be an embarrassment
of an honors student!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Even in the midst of fire or drowning in 
water! 
I'll Bakushin for the sake of victory!!

The way this turned out was different
from the original intention, but it
seems to have resonated with Sakura
Bakushin O nonetheless.
